00013 #ifndef SLMAP_H
00014 #define SLMAP_H
00015 
00016 #include <stdlib.h>
00017 
00018 #include <l4/sys/compiler.h>
00019 
00020 EXTERN_C_BEGIN
00021 
00022 /*
00023  * the map structure
00024  *
00025  * its basically a single linked list with a
00026  * key and a data entry
00027  */
00028 typedef struct slmap_t
00029 {
00030   struct slmap_t* next;    /* pointer to next entry */
00031   void *key;             /* the key of the map entry */
00032   unsigned key_size;     /* the size of the key entry */
00033   void *data;            /* the data of the map entry */
00034 } slmap_t;
00035 
00036 /*
00037  * function prototypes
00038  */
00039 
00040 L4_CV slmap_t*
00041 map_new_entry(void* key, unsigned key_size, void *data);
00042 
00043 L4_CV slmap_t*
00044 map_new_sentry(char* key, void* data);
00045 
00046 L4_CV slmap_t*
00047 map_append(slmap_t* list, slmap_t* new_entry);
00048 
00049 L4_CV slmap_t*
00050 map_remove(slmap_t* list, slmap_t* entry);
00051 
00052 L4_CV void
00053 map_free_entry(slmap_t** entry);
00054 
00055 L4_CV slmap_t*
00056 map_get_at(slmap_t* list, int n);
00057 
00058 L4_CV slmap_t*
00059 map_add(slmap_t* list, slmap_t* new_entry);
00060 
00061 L4_CV void
00062 map_insert_after(slmap_t* after, slmap_t* new_entry);
00063 
00064 L4_CV slmap_t*
00065 map_find(slmap_t* list, void* key, unsigned key_size);
00066 
00067 L4_CV slmap_t*
00068 map_sfind(slmap_t* list, const char* key);
00069 
00070 /*
00071  * implementatic of static inline
00072  */
00073 
00074 static inline unsigned char
00075 map_is_empty(slmap_t* list)
00076 {
00077   return (list) ? 0 : 1;
00078 }
00079 
00080 static inline void
00081 map_free(slmap_t **list)
00082 {
00083   while (*list)
00084     *list = map_remove(*list, *list);
00085 }
00086 
00087 static inline int
00088 map_elements(slmap_t* list)
00089 {
00090   register int n;
00091   for (n=0; list; list=list->next) 
00092       n++;
00093   return n;
00094 }
00095 
00096 EXTERN_C_END
00097 
00098 #endif /* SLMAP_H */
